metadata.title: Davide Longo | Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Dev, Musician and Surfskater based in Italy

about.text: Dev, Musician and Surfskater based in Italy
about.subtext: Hi, I'm Davide, a humanities graduate whose main focus is building digital products, currently employed as a Full Stack Developer. When I'm not coding, you can find me surfskating, playing gigs or maybe exploring the world.

experience.title: Deda Digital
experience.desc: I'm building custom ecommerce solutions. I'm also setting up schedules services and serveless microservices. Some tasks require me to implement marketing automation tools inside our products.

experience.title: Freelance
experience.desc: I've built a few static websites and WordPress blogs before being employed. I'm still building random stuff for myself to learn new technologies and level-up my stack, some of which my are on my GitHub, while other lay dormant on my hard drive.

certification.title: PCAP - Certified Associate in Python Programming
